articles.description: Daimler Trucks has its North American headquarters on Swan Island, where it employs about 2,600 in corporate roles, research and engineering, and production of Western Star trucks.
articles.content: FRANKFURT, Germany German automaker Daimler will split itself into two independent companies by spinning off its truck and bus division, a move the company said would give both the freedom to operate… [+2518 chars]
